duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide production support and manage incident resolution against established Service level agreements
Document issues and the resolutions of the solution procedures
Maintain application configuration including user security to meet requirements
Manage service requests to fulfill business and product support requests
Plan and ensure housekeeping and application maintenance activities to support application health
Create/update support procedures and ensure maintenance of standard operating procedure (SOP)
Prepare and provide operational and performance dashboards for goal trending and reporting
Coach and oversee work and project coordination within the Applications Support team

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in information technology or equivalent experience (Master's preferred)
